code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{ShopContext}from'../../Context/ShopContext';import{WishlistContext}from'../../Context/WishlistContext';import{Item}from'../Item/Item';import'./Wishlist.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Wishlist=()=>{const{all_product}=useContext(ShopContext);const{wishlist,toggleWishlist}=useContext(WishlistContext);const items=all_product.filter(p=>wishlist.includes(p.id));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wishlist-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Wishlist"}),items.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No items in wishlist yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"wishlist-grid",children:items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wishlist-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Item,{id:item.id,name:item.name,image:item.image,new_price:item.new_price,old_price:item.old_price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"wishlist-remove",onClick:()=>toggleWishlist(item.id,item),children:"Remove"})]},item.id))})]});};export default Wishlist;
